page.title: 01Area Summary
page.content: Our area is almost mainly farmland. The village of Grampound,properly known as Grampound with Creed is where we find most people.The rest of the area has farm houses and hamlets but Grampound has the most. The River Fal runs through the area and through the village and in the past was one of the main reasons for the village being established.Years ago this river was navigable through the village but this is no longer so. The main A390 passes through the area and through the village. This road links St. Austell with Truro and is always very busy so causes many problems in the village as regards safety and noise. We have covered the following topics to show our area: education, clubs, events,home life and farming.
